availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John H. Etheridge (Lyon County, Kentucky, wood chopper)

body.p: Lyon County, Kentucky, wood chopper. Virginia native. Married to Cecelia Etheridge. Father of James W. Etheridge, Elizabeth J. Etheridge, Moses W. Etheridge, Sally G. Etheridge, Mary A. V. Etheridge, Cecelia L. Etheridge, William M. Etheridge, and Martha M. Etheridge. Married to Elizabeth Timmons Etheridge on February 6, 1865. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1850. Wood chopper in Lyon County in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 2, p. 86; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, p. 83; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lyon County, District 3, p. 8; Jordan Dodd, comp., Kentucky Marriages, 1851-1900 Ancestry, Lyon County, Kentucky, February 6, 1865.
